contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|stammer}} A '''stammer''' or [[stuttering]] is a speech disorder typified by the involuntary repetition of a sound or sounds. '''Stammer''' or '''Stammers''' may also refer to: * [[Steven Stamkos]] (b. 1990), Canadian hockey player * [[Kay Stammers]] (1914-2005), British tennis player * [[Keith Stammers]], 20th-century English politician * [[Stan Stammers]] (b. 1961), British punk musician * "Stammer", a song from the album [[It Doesn't Matter Anymore (album)|It Doesn't Matter Anymore]] ==See also== *[[List of people known as the Stammerer]] *[[Balbus (disambiguation)]] *[[Stutter (disambiguation)]] {{disamb}}
